name: Amphibious
description_template: This creature can breathe air and water.

name: Bound to the Courts
description_template: This creature has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

name: Aggressive
description_template: As a bonus action, this creature can move up to its speed toward a hostile feature it can see.

name: Ambusher
description_template: This creature has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

name: Avoidance
description_template: If this creature is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Blood Frenzy
description_template: This creature has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

name: Constrict
description_template: *Melee Weapon Atack:* +{prof + STR} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 7 ({size_mod}d4 + {STR}) bludgeoning damage. On a hit, if the target is {size} or smaller, it must make a DC {8 + prof + STR} Strength saving throw or be grappled.

name: Frightful Presence
description_template: Each creature of this creature's choice within 120 ft. that can hear or see it must make a DC {8 + prof + CHA} Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

name: Magic Resistance
description_template: This creature has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

name: Nimble Escape
description_template: This creature can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

name: Pack Tactics
description_template: This creature has advantage on attack rolls against a target creature if at least one of the creature's allies is within 5 ft. of the target and the ally is not incapacitated.

name: Parry
description_template: This creature adds {prof} to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

name: Regeneration
description_template: At the beginning of this creature's turn, it regains {prof + CON} hit points.

name: Aversion to Fire
description_template: If this creature takes fire damage, it can't use its Regeneration feature on its next turn.

name: Aversion to Acid
description_template: If this creature takes acid damage, it can't use its Regeneration feature on its next turn.

name: Relentless
description_template: If this creature would be reduced to 0 hit points, it makes a DC {8 + prof} Constitution saving throw. On a successful saving throw, it survives with 1 hp instead.

name: Stench
description_template: Any other creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of this creature must succeed on a DC

name: Sunlight Sensitivity
description_template: While in sunlight, this creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
